模块 org.overrun.swgl.core
程序包 org.overrun.swgl.core.gl

类 GLBatch

java.lang.Object
org.overrun.swgl.core.gl.GLBatch
所有已实现的接口:
AutoCloseable, ITessCallback
public class GLBatch extends Object implements ITessCallback, AutoCloseable
The batch drawing.
从以下版本开始:
0.2.0
作者:
squid233

    • GLBatch

      public GLBatch(boolean useMemUtil)
      Create a batch.
      参数:
      useMemUtil - Use MemoryUtil if true; otherwise use BufferUtils. Defaults to true.
      另请参阅:
      • GLBatch()

    • begin

      public void begin(@NotNull @NotNull VertexLayout layout, int initialCount)
      Begin drawing by a vertex layout.

      The initial count was used to alloc buffer.

      参数:
      layout - the vertex layout
      initialCount - the initial vertex count

    • indexBefore

      public GLBatch indexBefore(int... indices)
      Add indices before adding vertices.

      Example

      begin(layout);
 indexBefore(0, 1, 2, 2, 3, 0);
 vertex(x0, y0).emit();
 vertex(x0, y1).emit();
 vertex(x1, y1).emit();
 vertex(x1, y0).emit();
 end();
      参数:
      indices - the indices
      返回:
      this

    • indexAfter

      public GLBatch indexAfter(int... indices)
      Add indices after adding vertices.

      Example

      begin(layout);
 vertex(x0, y0).emit();
 vertex(x0, y1).emit();
 vertex(x1, y1).emit();
 vertex(x1, y0).emit();
 indexAfter(0, 1, 2, 2, 3, 0);
 end();
      参数:
      indices - the indices
      返回:
      this

    • emit

      public void emit()
      Emit a vertex with the vertex layout.

    • emit

      public void emit(float x, float y, float z, float w, float r, float g, float b, float a, float s, float t, float p, float q, float nx, float ny, float nz)
      从接口复制的说明: ITessCallback
      Emit a vertex.
      指定者:
      emit 在接口中 ITessCallback
      参数:
      x - the pos x
      y - the pos y
      z - the pos z
      w - the pos w
      r - the color red
      g - the color green
      b - the color blue
      a - the color alpha
      s - the texture-coord s
      t - the texture-coord t
      p - the texture-coord r
      q - the texture-coord q
      nx - the normal x
      ny - the normal y
      nz - the normal z

      Gets the written bytes. Usually is the buffer limit.
      返回:

      public ByteBuffer getBuffer()
      Get the buffer on heap.
      返回:
      the buffer; don't modify it

      Get the index buffer on heap.
      返回:
      the index buffer; don't modify it

    • getVertexCount

      public int getVertexCount()

    • getIndexCount

      public int getIndexCount()

    • isVtExpanded

      public boolean isVtExpanded()
      Return true if the vertex buffer of this batch is expanded.

      Example

      boolean b = batch.isVtExpanded();
 if (b) {
     CopyToBuffer(batch.getBuffer());
 }
      返回:
      is vertex buffer expanded

    • isIxExpanded

      public boolean isIxExpanded()
      Return true if the index buffer of this batch is expanded.

      Example

      boolean b = batch.isIxExpanded();
 if (b) {
     CopyToBuffer(batch.getIndexBuffer());
 }
      返回:
      is vertex buffer expanded

    • close

      public void close()
      指定者:
      close 在接口中 AutoCloseable
